name: item_blink
description:
Active: Blink

Teleport to a target point up to %blink_range% units away.

Blink Dagger cannot be used for %blink_damage_cooldown% seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.
lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

name: item_blades_of_attack
lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

name: item_broadsword
lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

name: item_chainmail
lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

name: item_claymore
lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

name: item_helm_of_iron_will
lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

name: item_javelin
description:
Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a %bonus_chance%%% chance to pierce through evasion and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus damage.
lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

name: item_mithril_hammer
lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

name: item_platemail
lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

name: item_quarterstaff
lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

name: item_quelling_blade
description:
Active: Chop Tree/Ward

Destroy a target tree or ward. Chop cast range is increased when targeting wards.

Tree Range: %quelling_range_tooltip%
Ward Range: %cast_range_ward%

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by %damage_bonus% for melee heroes, and %damage_bonus_ranged% for ranged.
lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

name: item_ring_of_protection
lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

name: item_gauntlets
lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

name: item_slippers
lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

name: item_mantle
lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

name: item_branches
description:
Use: Plant Tree

Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for %tree_duration% seconds.

Range: %range_tooltip%
lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

name: item_belt_of_strength
lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

name: item_boots_of_elves
lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

name: item_robe
lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

name: item_circlet
lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

name: item_ogre_axe
lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

name: item_blade_of_alacrity
lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

name: item_staff_of_wizardry
lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

name: item_ultimate_orb
lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

name: item_gloves
lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

name: item_lifesteal
description:
Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for %lifesteal_percent%%% of attack damage dealt.
lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

name: item_ring_of_regen
lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

name: item_sobi_mask
lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

name: item_boots
description: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

name: item_gem
description:
Passive: True Sight

Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within %radius% range of its carrier.

Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.
lore:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

name: item_cloak
lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

name: item_talisman_of_evasion
lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

name: item_cheese
description:
Use: Fondue

Instantly restores %health_restore% health and %mana_restore% mana.
lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.

name: item_magic_stick
description:
Active: Energy Charge

Instantly restores %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.

Max %max_charges% charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability.
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

name: item_magic_wand
description:
Active: Energy Charge

Instantly restores %restore_per_charge% health and mana per charge stored.

Max %max_charges% charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within %charge_radius% range uses an ability.
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

name: item_ghost
description:
Active: Ghost Form

You enter ghost form for %duration% seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and %extra_spell_damage_percent%%% more vulnerable to magic damage.
lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

name: item_clarity
description:
Use: Replenish

Grants %mana_regen% mana regeneration to the target for %buff_duration% seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: %range_tooltip%
lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

name: item_flask
description:
Use: Salve

Grants %health_regen% health regeneration to the target for %buff_duration% seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: %tooltip_range%
lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

name: item_dust
description:
Use: Reveal

Reveals and slows invisible Heroes by %movespeed% in a %radius% radius around the caster for %duration% seconds.
lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.

name: item_bottle
description:
Active: Regenerate

Consumes a charge to restore %health_restore% health and %mana_restore% mana over %restore_time% seconds.

Range: %tooltip_range%

Healing stops if attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan. Bottle can be refilled at your team's fountain. Runes can be stored in the Bottle for later use, and are activated automatically after 2 minutes.
lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

name: item_ward_observer
description:
Use: Plant

Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a %vision_range% radius to your team. Lasts %duration_minutes_tooltip% minutes.

Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

Range: %tooltip_range%
lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.

name: item_ward_sentry
description:
Use: Plant

Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a %true_sight_range% radius.
Duration: %duration_minutes_tooltip% minutes.

Does not grant ground vision.
Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

Range: %tooltip_range%
lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

name: item_tango
description:
Use: Devour

Consume a target tree to gain %health_regen% health regeneration for %buff_duration% seconds. Consuming a ward or Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Comes with %tooltip_charges% charges. Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

Range: %tooltip_range%
Ward Range: %cast_range_ward%
lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

name: item_courier
description:
Use: Deploy Courier

Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.
lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.

name: item_tpscroll
description:
Use: Teleport

After channeling for %tooltip_channel_time% seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building.

Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.
lore: What a hero truly needs.

name: item_travel_boots
description:
Active: Teleport

Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Teleporting to a unit is interrupted if the target unit dies.

Shares a cooldown with Town Portal Scroll.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

name: item_phase_boots
description:
Active: Phase

Gives %phase_movement_speed%%% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and %phase_movement_speed_range%%% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units for %phase_duration% seconds.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

name: item_demon_edge
lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

name: item_eagle
lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

name: item_reaver
lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

name: item_relic
lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

name: item_hyperstone
lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

name: item_ring_of_health
lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

name: item_void_stone
lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

name: item_mystic_staff
lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

name: item_energy_booster
lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

name: item_point_booster
lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

name: item_vitality_booster
lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

name: item_power_treads
description:
Active: Switch Attribute

Switches between +%bonus_stat% Strength, +%bonus_stat% Agility, or +%bonus_stat% Intelligence.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

name: item_hand_of_midas
description:
Active: Transmute

Kills a non-hero target for %bonus_gold% gold and %xp_multiplier%x experience.

Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

Range: %transmute_cast_range_tooltip%
lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

name: item_oblivion_staff
lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

name: item_pers
lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

name: item_poor_mans_shield
description:
Passive: Damage Block

When cooldown is ready, blocks %bonus_block_melee% damage on melee heroes and %bonus_block_range% on ranged heroes. Only triggers on attacks from heroes.

Gives a %block_chance%%% chance to block %damage_block_melee% damage on melee heroes, and %damage_block_ranged% damage on ranged.
lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.

name: item_bracer
lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

name: item_wraith_band
lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

name: item_null_talisman
lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

name: item_mekansm
description:
Active: Restore

Heals %heal_amount% health and gives +%heal_bonus_armor% armor to allied units in a %heal_radius% radius.

Passive: Mekansm Aura

Grants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration to allied units in a %aura_radius% radius.
lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

name: item_vladmir
description:
Passive: Vladmir's Aura

Grants lifesteal (%vampiric_aura%%% for melee heroes, %vampiric_aura_ranged%%% for ranged), %hp_regen% health regeneration, %mana_regen_aura% mana regeneration, %damage_aura%%% bonus attack damage, and %armor_aura% armor to nearby allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%
lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

name: item_buckler
description:
Active: Armor Bonus

Gives +%bonus_aoe_armor% armor to all allied units. Lasts %bonus_aoe_duration_hero% seconds on heroes, %bonus_aoe_duration% seconds on units.

Radius: %bonus_aoe_radius%
lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

name: item_ring_of_basilius
description:
Passive: Basilius Aura

Grants %aura_mana_regen% mana regeneration and %aura_bonus_armor% armor in a %aura_radius% radius.

Toggle: Aura

Deactivate aura to stop effecting non-hero units.
lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

name: item_pipe
description:
Active: Barrier

Gives a shield that blocks %barrier_block% magic damage to all nearby allies. Lasts %barrier_duration% seconds.

Radius: %barrier_radius%

Passive: Insight Aura

Gives allied units %aura_health_regen% health regeneration and %magic_resistance_aura%%% magic resistance.

Radius: %aura_radius%
lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

name: item_urn_of_shadows
description:
Active: Soul Release

Provides %soul_heal_amount% health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals %soul_damage_amount% damage per second when cast on enemies.

Lasts %duration% seconds.

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within %soul_radius% units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Cast Range: %soul_release_range_tooltip%
lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

name: item_headdress
description:
Passive: Regeneration Aura

Grants %aura_health_regen% health regeneration to allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%
lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

name: item_sheepstick
description:
Active: Hex

Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for %sheep_duration% seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.
Instantly destroys illusions.

Range: %tooltip_range%
lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

name: item_orchid
description:
Active: Soul Burn

Silences the target unit for %silence_duration% seconds. At the end of the silence, %silence_damage_percent%%% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.

Range: %tooltip_range%
lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

name: item_cyclone
description:
Active: Cyclone

Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for %cyclone_duration% seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.

Enemy units take %tooltip_drop_damage% magical damage upon landing.

Range: %cast_range_tooltip%
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

name: item_force_staff
description:
Active: Force

Pushes any target unit %push_length% units in the direction it is facing.

Range: %tooltip_range%
lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

name: item_dagon
description:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %range_tooltip%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: item_necronomicon
description:
Active: Demonic Summoning

Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for %summon_duration% seconds.

Warrior:

Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3.
Health: %warrior_health_tooltip%
Damage: %warrior_damage_tooltip%
Mana Break Damage: %warrior_mana_break_tooltip%
Last Will Damage: %explosion%

Archer:

Has a passive movement and attack speed aura.
Health: %archer_health_tooltip%
Damage: %archer_damage_tooltip%
Mana Burn Damage: %archer_mana_burn%
Aura Move Speed: %archer_move_speed%
Aura Attack Speed: %archer_attack_speed%
Aura Radius: %archer_aura_radius_tooltip%
lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

name: item_ultimate_scepter
description:
Passive: Ultimate Upgrade

Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of certain heroes.
lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

name: item_refresher
description:
Active: Reset Cooldowns

Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

name: item_assault
description:
Passive: Assault Aura

Grants %aura_attack_speed% attack speed and %aura_positive_armor% armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by %aura_negative_armor%.

Radius: %aura_radius%
lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

name: item_heart
description:
Passive: Health Regeneration

Restores %health_regen_rate%%% of max health per second.

If damage is taken from an enemy hero or Roshan, this ability is disabled for %cooldown_melee% seconds for melee heroes, or %cooldown_ranged_tooltip% seconds for ranged heroes.
lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

name: item_black_king_bar
description:
Active: Avatar

Grants Spell Immunity and 100%% Magic Damage Resistance. Duration and cooldown decrease with each use.

Duration: %duration%
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

name: item_aegis
description:
Passive: Reincarnation

Brings you to life with full health and mana %reincarnate_time% seconds after you die, at the location where you died.

Reincarnation must be used within %disappear_time_minutes_tooltip% minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears. If it expires, it will heal you over 5 seconds (dispels on damage).
lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

name: item_shivas_guard
description:
Active: Arctic Blast

Emits a freezing wave that deals %blast_damage% magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by %blast_movement_speed%%% for %blast_debuff_duration% seconds.

Radius: %blast_radius%

Passive: Freezing Aura

Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by %aura_attack_speed%.

Radius: %aura_radius%
lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

name: item_bloodstone
description:
Active: Pocket Deny

Instantly causes you to die.

Must ground target to cast. Cannot self cast.

Passive: Bloodpact

Begins with %tooltip_charges% charges, and gains a charge each time an enemy hero dies within %charge_range% range.

Each charge grants %mana_per_charge% mana regeneration per second, and reduces respawn time by %respawn_time_reduction% seconds.

If the bearer dies, the Bloodstone loses a third of its charges.
lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

name: item_sphere
description:
Passive: Spellblock

Blocks most targeted spells once every %block_cooldown% seconds.

Active: Transfer Spellblock

Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for %block_cooldown% seconds.

Range: %cast_range_tooltip%
lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

name: item_vanguard
description:
Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %block_chance%%% chance to block %block_damage_melee% damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and %block_damage_ranged% damage on ranged.
lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

name: item_blade_mail
description:
Active: Damage Return

For %duration% seconds, duplicates any damage taken back to the unit that dealt the damage.
lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

name: item_soul_booster
lore: Regain lost courage.

name: item_hood_of_defiance
description:
Active: Barrier

Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to %barrier_block% magical damage. Lasts %barrier_duration% seconds.
lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

name: item_rapier
description:
Passive: Everlasting

Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.

Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.
lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

name: item_monkey_king_bar
description:
Passive: Pierce

Grants each attack a %bonus_chance%%% chance to pierce through evasion and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus pure damage.
lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

name: item_radiance
description:
Toggle: Burn

When active, scorches enemies for %aura_damage% damage per second, and causes them to miss %blind_pct%%% of their attacks.

Radius: %aura_radius%
lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

name: item_butterfly
description:
Active: Flutter

Grants %bonus_move_speed%%% additional movement speed for %duration% seconds.
lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

name: item_greater_crit
description:
Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal %tooltip_crit_damage%%% additional damage.
lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

name: item_basher
description:
Passive: Bash

Grants melee heroes a %bash_chance_melee%%% chance on hit to stun the target for %bash_duration% seconds and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus damage. Bash pierces evasion. Bash chance for ranged heroes is %bash_chance_ranged%%.
lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

name: item_bfury
description:
Active: Chop Tree/Ward

Destroy a target tree or ward.

Tree Cast Range: %cast_range_tooltip%
Ward Cast Range: %cast_range_ward%

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by %tooltip_quelling_bonus%%% for melee heroes, and %tooltip_quelling_bonus_ranged%%% for ranged.

Passive: Cleave

Deals %cleave_damage_percent%%% of attack damage in a cone up to %cleave_distance% around the target. (Melee Only)
lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

name: item_manta
description:
Active: Mirror Image

Creates %images_count% images of your hero that last %tooltip_illusion_duration% seconds.

Melee images deal %tooltip_damage_outgoing_melee%%% damage and take %tooltip_damage_incoming_melee_total_pct%%% damage, while Ranged images deal %tooltip_damage_outgoing_ranged%%% and take %tooltip_damage_incoming_ranged_total_pct%%% damage.

Cooldown increased by %tooltip_ranged_cooldown_increase% seconds on ranged heroes.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

name: item_lesser_crit
description:
Passive: Critical Strike

Grants each attack a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal %tooltip_crit_damage%%% additional damage.
lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

name: item_armlet
description:
Toggle: Unholy Strength

When active, Unholy Strength grants +%unholy_bonus_damage% damage, +%unholy_bonus_strength% strength and +%unholy_bonus_armor% armor, but drains %unholy_health_drain_per_second_tooltip% health per second.

You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.
lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

name: item_invis_sword
description:
Active: Shadow Walk

Makes you invisible for %windwalk_duration% seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move %windwalk_movement_speed%%% faster and can move through units.

If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain %windwalk_bonus_damage% bonus damage on that attack.
lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

name: item_sange_and_yasha
description:
Passive: Greater Maim

Each attack has a %maim_chance%%% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by %maim_slow_movement%%% and attack speed by %maim_slow_attack% when used by a melee hero. Reduces enemy hero movement by %maim_slow_movement_range%%% and attack speed by %maim_slow_attack_range% when used by a ranged hero. Effect lasts %maim_duration% seconds.
lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

name: item_satanic
description:
Active: Unholy Rage

Increases Lifesteal percentage to %unholy_lifesteal_total_tooltip%%% for %unholy_duration% seconds.

Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for %lifesteal_percent%%% of attack damage dealt.
lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

name: item_mjollnir
description:
Active: Static Charge

Places a charged shield on a target unit for %static_duration% seconds which has a %static_chance%%% chance to release a %static_damage% damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and %static_strikes% additional enemies.

Range: %tooltip_range%

Passive: Chain Lightning

Grants a %chain_chance%%% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between %chain_strikes% targets within a %chain_radius% radius, dealing %chain_damage% magical damage to each.
lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

name: item_skadi
description:
Passive: Cold Attack

Attacks lower enemy attack speed by %cold_attack_speed% and movement speed by %cold_movement_speed%%%.

Lasts %cold_duration_melee% seconds when used by melee heroes, and %cold_duration_ranged% seconds when used by ranged.
lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

name: item_sange
description:
Passive: Lesser Maim

Each attack has a %maim_chance%%% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by %maim_slow_movement%%% and attack speed by %maim_slow_attack% when used by a melee hero. Reduces enemy hero movement by %maim_slow_movement_range%%% and attack speed by %maim_slow_attack_range% when used by a ranged hero. Effect lasts %maim_duration% seconds.
lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

name: item_helm_of_the_dominator
description:
Active: Dominate

Takes control of one neutral, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to %speed_base% and max health to a minimum of %health_min%.

Dominated units with a max health of greater than %health_min% retain their original max health. Dominated unit's bounty is set to %tooltip_bounty% gold.

Range: %tooltip_range%

Passive: Dominator Aura

Increases nearby allies' attack speed by %attack_speed_aura% and health regen by %hp_regen_aura%.

Radius: %aura_radius%
lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

name: item_maelstrom
description:
Passive: Chain Lightning

Grants a %chain_chance%%% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between %chain_strikes% targets within a %chain_radius% radius, dealing %chain_damage% magical damage to each.
lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

name: item_desolator
description:
Passive: Corruption

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by %corruption_armor% for %corruption_duration% seconds.
lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

name: item_yasha
lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.

name: item_mask_of_madness
description:
Active: Berserk

Gives %berserk_bonus_attack_speed% attack speed and %berserk_bonus_movement_speed%%% movement speed, but reduces your armor by %berserk_armor_reduction% and silences you. Lasts %berserk_duration% seconds.

Passive: Lifesteal

Heals the attacker for %lifesteal_percent%%% of attack damage dealt.
lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

name: item_diffusal_blade
description:
Active: Purge

Targets an enemy, slowing it for %purge_slow_duration% seconds.

Range: %cast_range_tooltip%

Passive: Manabreak

Each attack burns %feedback_mana_burn% mana from the target, and deals %damage_per_burn% physical damage per burned mana.

Burns %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_melee% mana per attack from melee illusions and %feedback_mana_burn_illusion_ranged% mana per attack from ranged illusions.
lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

name: item_ethereal_blade
description:
Active: Ether Blast

Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and %ethereal_damage_bonus%%% more vulnerable to magic damage. Lasts for %duration_ally% seconds on allies and %duration% seconds on enemies.

Enemy targets are also slowed by %blast_movement_slow%%%, and take %blast_agility_multiplier%x your primary attribute + %blast_damage_base% as magical damage.

Range: %tooltip_range%
lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

name: item_soul_ring
description:
Active: Sacrifice

Consume %health_sacrifice% health to temporarily gain %mana_gain% mana. Lasts %duration% seconds.

If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.
lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

name: item_arcane_boots
description:
Active: Replenish Mana

Restores %replenish_amount% mana to all nearby allies.
Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

Radius: %replenish_radius%
lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

name: item_orb_of_venom
description:
Passive: Poison Attack

Poisons the target, dealing %poison_damage% damage per second for %poison_duration% seconds and slowing movement %poison_movement_speed_melee%%% if the equipped hero is melee, or %poison_movement_speed_range%%% if they are ranged.
lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

name: item_stout_shield
description:
Passive: Damage Block

Gives a %block_chance%%% chance to block %damage_block_melee% damage on melee heroes, and %damage_block_ranged% damage on ranged.
lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.

name: item_ancient_janggo
description:
Active: Endurance

Gives +%bonus_attack_speed_pct% attack speed and +%bonus_movement_speed_pct%%% movement speed to nearby allies for %duration% seconds.

Radius: %radius%

Passive: Swiftness Aura

Gives %bonus_aura_movement_speed% movement speed to nearby allies.

Radius: %radius%
lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

name: item_medallion_of_courage
description:
Active: Valor

If cast on an ally, grants them the %bonus_armor% armor, and removing it from the caster.

If cast on an enemy, reduces %bonus_armor% armor on both the enemy and the caster.

Cannot target magic immune enemies.

Range: %valor_cast_range_tooltip%
lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.

name: item_smoke_of_deceit
description:
Use: Disguise

The user and all nearby allied player-controlled units in a %visibility_radius% radius gain Deceit and %bonus_movement_speed%%% bonus movement speed for %duration% seconds.

Attacking, or moving within %visibility_radius% range of an enemy hero or tower, will break the invisibility.

Disguise grants invisibility that is immune to True Sight.
lore: The charlatan wizard Myrddin's only true contribution to the arcane arts.

name: item_veil_of_discord
description:
Active: Magic Weakness

Cast a %debuff_radius% radius blast that decreases enemy magic resistance by %resist_debuff%%%.

Range: %tooltip_range%
Duration: %resist_debuff_duration% seconds.
lore: The headwear of corrupt magi.

name: item_necronomicon_2
description:
Active: Demonic Summoning

Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for %summon_duration% seconds.

Warrior:

Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3.
Health: %warrior_health_tooltip%
Damage: %warrior_damage_tooltip%
Mana Break Damage: %warrior_mana_break_tooltip%
Last Will Damage: %explosion%

Archer:

Has an activated mana burn ability, and a passive movement and attack speed aura.
Health: %archer_health_tooltip%
Damage: %archer_damage_tooltip%
Mana Burn Damage: %archer_mana_burn%
Aura Move Speed: %archer_move_speed%
Aura Attack Speed: %archer_attack_speed%
Aura Radius: %archer_aura_radius_tooltip%
lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

name: item_necronomicon_3
description:
Active: Demonic Summoning

Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for %summon_duration% seconds.

Warrior:

Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3.
Health: %warrior_health_tooltip%
Damage: %warrior_damage_tooltip%
Mana Break Damage: %warrior_mana_break_tooltip%
Last Will Damage: %explosion%

Archer:

Has an activated mana burn ability, and a passive movement and attack speed aura.
Health: %archer_health_tooltip%
Damage: %archer_damage_tooltip%
Mana Burn Damage: %archer_mana_burn%
Aura Move Speed: %archer_move_speed%
Aura Attack Speed: %archer_attack_speed%
Aura Radius: %archer_aura_radius_tooltip%
lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

name: item_dagon_2
description:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %range_tooltip%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: item_dagon_3
description:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %range_tooltip%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: item_dagon_4
description:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %range_tooltip%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: item_dagon_5
description:
Active: Energy Burst

Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit.

Damage: %damage%
Range: %range_tooltip%
Mana Cost: %mana_cost_tooltip%
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

name: item_rod_of_atos
description:
Active: Cripple

Roots the target for %duration% seconds.

Range: %tooltip_range%
lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

name: item_abyssal_blade
description:
Active: Overwhelm

Stuns a target enemy unit for %stun_duration% seconds.

Pierces Spell Immunity.

Passive: Bash

Grants melee heroes a %bash_chance_melee%%% chance on hit to stun the target for %bash_duration% seconds and deal %bonus_chance_damage% bonus damage. Bash pierces evasion. Bash chance for ranged heroes is %bash_chance_ranged%%.
lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

name: item_heavens_halberd
description:
Active: Disarm

Prevents a target from attacking for %disarm_melee% seconds on melee targets, and %disarm_range% seconds on ranged targets.

Range: %disarm_cast_range_tooltip%

Passive: Lesser Maim

Each attack has a %maim_chance%%% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by %maim_slow_movement%%% and attack speed by %maim_slow_attack% if the user is melee. Reduces enemy hero movement by %maim_slow_movement_range%%% and attack speed by %maim_slow_attack_range% if the user is ranged. Effect lasts %maim_duration% seconds.
lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

name: item_ring_of_aquila
description:
Passive: Aquila Aura

Grants %aura_mana_regen% mana regeneration and %aura_bonus_armor% armor to nearby allies.

Radius: %aura_radius%

Toggle: Aura

Deactivate to stop affecting non-hero units.
lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

name: item_tranquil_boots
description:
Passive: Break

Whenever you attack or are attacked, the bonus %bonus_health_health% HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to %broken_movement_speed% for %break_time% seconds.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

name: item_shadow_amulet
description:
Active: Fade

Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero as long as target unit remains still.

Has a %fade_time% second fade time, and breaks instantly upon moving.

There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.
lore: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.

name: item_enchanted_mango
description:
Use: Eat Mango

Instantly restore %replenish_amount% mana.

Range: %range_tooltip%
lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.

name: item_ward_dispenser
description:
Use: Plant

Plant the currently active ward. Double-Click to switch the currently active ward.

Range: %tooltip_range%
lore: Advancements in stacking efficiency have made wards easier to carry than ever.

name: item_travel_boots_2
description:
Active: Teleport

Teleports you to any allied structure or unit, including heroes. Teleporting to a unit is interrupted if the target unit dies.

Shares a cooldown with Town Portal Scroll.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

name: item_meteor_hammer
description:
Active: Meteor Hammer

CHANNELED - After a succesful channel, summons a meteor that strikes a %impact_radius% AoE, stunning enemies for %stun_duration% seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage over time to enemies units and buildings for %burn_duration% seconds.

Building Impact Damage: %impact_damage_buildings%
Building Over Time Damage: %burn_dps_buildings%

Non-Building Impact Damage: %impact_damage_units%
Non-Building Over Time Damage: %burn_dps_units%

Channel Duration: %max_duration% seconds.
Landing Time: %land_time% seconds.

name: item_nullifier
description:
Active: Nullify

Dispels the target and mutes them for %mute_duration% seconds. Anytime the muted target is attacked, it will be slowed by %slow_pct%%% for %slow_interval_duration% seconds.

name: item_lotus_orb
description:
Active: Echo Shell

Applies a shield to the target unit for %active_duration% seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster.

The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell.

Range: %cast_range_tooltip%
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel
lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

name: item_solar_crest
description:
Active: Shine

When cast on an ally, grants them %bonus_armor% armor and %bonus_evasion%%% evasion. When cast on an enemy, removes %bonus_armor% of their armor and grants your allies %truestrike_chance%%% Accuracy on the target.

Removes the armor and evasion from the caster when used.

Cannot target magic immune enemies.

Range: %valor_cast_range_tooltip%
lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

name: item_guardian_greaves
description:
Active: Mend

Restores %replenish_health% health and %replenish_mana% mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.

Radius: %replenish_radius%
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

Passive: Guardian Aura

Provides nearby allies with %aura_health_regen% health regeneration and %aura_armor% bonus armor. If an allied hero's health falls below %aura_bonus_threshold%%%, they receive %aura_health_regen_bonus% health regeneration and %aura_armor_bonus% armor. Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

name: item_aether_lens
description:
Passive: Aethereal Focus

Increases targeted spell and item cast range by %cast_range_bonus%.
lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.

name: item_octarine_core
description:
Passive: Cooldown Reduction

Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by %bonus_cooldown%%%.

Passive: Spell Lifesteal

%hero_lifesteal%%% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.

Lifesteal reduced to %creep_lifesteal%%% against creeps.
lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

name: item_dragon_lance
description:
Passive: Dragon's Reach

Increases attack range of ranged heroes by %base_attack_range%.
lore: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.

name: item_faerie_fire
description:
Use: Imbue

Instantly restores %hp_restore% HP.
lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.

name: item_iron_talon
description:
Active: Chop

Targets a non-player enemy unit to remove %creep_damage_pct%%% of its current HP.

If cast on a tree or ward, instantly destroys it.

Unit Range: %tooltip_range%
Tree Range: %quelling_range_tooltip%
Ward Range: %cast_range_ward%

Passive: Quell

Increases attack damage against non-hero units by %damage_bonus% for melee heroes, and %damage_bonus_ranged% for ranged.
lore: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.

name: item_blight_stone
description:
Passive: Lesser Corruption

Your attacks reduce the target's armor by %corruption_armor% for %corruption_duration% seconds.
lore: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.

name: item_tango_single
description:
Use: Devour

Consume a target tree to gain %health_regen% health regeneration for %buff_duration% seconds. Consuming a ward or Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Range: %tooltip_range%
Ward Range: %cast_range_ward%
lore: Om nom nom.

name: item_crimson_guard
description:
Active: Guard

For %duration% seconds, grant nearby allied heroes and buildings +%bonus_aoe_armor% armor, and a %block_chance_active%%% chance to block %block_damage_melee_active% damage from each incoming attack.

Units may only be affected by Guard once every %tooltip_reapply_time% seconds.

Radius: %bonus_aoe_radius%

Passive: Damage Block

Grants a %block_chance%%% chance to block %block_damage_melee% damage on melee heroes, and %block_damage_ranged% damage on ranged.
lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

name: item_wind_lace
description: Bonuses from multiple Wind Laces do not stack.
lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels

name: item_moon_shard
description:
Use: Consume

Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain %consumed_bonus% attack speed and %consumed_bonus_night_vision% bonus night vision. Max 1 use.

Passive: Shade Sight

Grants %bonus_night_vision% bonus night vision.
lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

name: item_silver_edge
description:
Active: Shadow Walk

Makes you invisible for %windwalk_duration% seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell. While invisible, you move %windwalk_movement_speed%%% faster and can move through units.

Attacking to end the invisibility will deal %windwalk_bonus_damage% bonus damage to the target, and for %backstab_duration% seconds, disable their passive abilities.
lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

name: item_bloodthorn
description:
Active: Soul Rend

Silences a target for %silence_duration% seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional %silence_damage_percent%%% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magic damage.
Range: %tooltip_range%

All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and %tooltip_crit_chance%%% chance to crit for %target_crit_multiplier%%% more damage.

Passive: Critical Strike

Grants a %crit_chance%%% chance for attacks to inflict %crit_multiplier%%% more damage.
lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

name: item_echo_sabre
description:
Passive: Echo Strike

Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a %movement_slow%% movement slow for %slow_duration% seconds on each strike.
lore: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

name: item_glimmer_cape
description:
Active: Glimmer

After a %fade_delay% second delay, grants invisibility and %active_magical_armor%%% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit for %duration% seconds.

Range: %tooltip_range%

Can be cast while channelling.
lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

name: item_combo_breaker
description:
Passive: Combo Breaker

When you take damage and your health falls below %health_threshold_pct%%, a strong dispel is applied and you gain a %buff_duration% second buff that causes all damage you deal and are dealt to be reduced to zero. Only triggers on player based damage.

Passive: Status Resistance

Reduces status effect durations by %status_resistance%%.

name: item_tome_of_knowledge
description:
Use: Enlighten

Grants you %xp_bonus% experience plus %xp_per_use% per tome consumed by your team.

Tomes Used By Team: %customval_team_tomes_used%
lore: That which raises beast to man and man to god.

name: item_refresher_shard
description:
Use: Reset Cooldowns

Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

name: item_hurricane_pike
description:
Active: Hurricane Thrust

Pushes you and target enemy %enemy_length% units away from each other, and for %range_duration% seconds, allows you to make %max_attacks% attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +%bonus_attack_speed% attack speed.

Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.

Allied Range: %tooltip_range%
Enemy Range: %cast_range_enemy%

Passive: Dragon's Reach

Increases attack range of ranged heroes by %base_attack_range%.
lore: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.

name: item_infused_raindrop
description:
Passive: Magical Damage Block

Consumes a charge to block %magic_damage_block% magic damage from damage instances over %min_damage% damage.

Comes with %initial_charges% charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.
lore: Elemental protection from magical assaults.

name: item_spirit_vessel
description:
Active: Soul Release

When used against enemies, it reduces health by %enemy_hp_drain%%% of current health per second, and reduces HP regeneration and healing by %hp_regen_reduction_enemy%%%. Deals %soul_damage_amount% damage per second.

When used on allies, it increases health by %ally_hp_gain%%% of current health per second, and increases HP regeneration and healing by %hp_regen_increase_allies%%%. Provides %soul_heal_amount% health regeneration per second.

Lasts %duration% seconds.

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within %soul_radius% units. Only the closest Spirit Vessel to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Cast Range: %soul_release_range_tooltip%

name: item_river_painter
description: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into liquid chrome for 15 minutes. <font color='#FF5555'>Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration.</font> Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

name: item_river_painter2
description: Pour this serum into the river to dry up the water for 15 minutes. <font color='#FF5555'>Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect . Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration.</font> Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

name: item_river_painter3
description: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into a green slime for 15 minutes. <font color='#FF5555'>Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration.</font> Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

name: item_river_painter4
description: Pour this serum into the river to make the water oily for 15 minutes. <font color='#FF5555'>Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration.</font> Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

name: item_river_painter5
description: Pour this serum into the river to make the water electric for 15 minutes. <font color='#FF5555'>Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration.</font> Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

name: item_river_painter6
description: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into a purple bubbling potion for 15 minutes. <font color='#FF5555'>Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration.</font> Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

name: item_river_painter7
description: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into blood for 15 minutes. <font color='#FF5555'>Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration.</font> Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.
